NAO Research
Madam Ella was part of the 'Robot in Residence' cohort, a robotics research program created and sponsored by the German Goethe Insitut.

Contact Madam Ella to get updates of the project's evolution this 2024, from robotics talks to journals and papers. Every quarter is an upgrade in the project research.

Did you know we had a scholarship fund aswell?

Read about the fund!
  • Benefit 1
    Tech Tutoring

    It has been proven that students learn better by analysis, not memorization. With the focus of one-on-one mentorship, we get to dive into child’s school syllabus. We build our coding projects as we 'revise' their school's tech books. We discuss every paragraph or every practice question. And they get to see the practical implications of each theory "live" with our projects.

  • Benefit 2
    Portfolio Building

    This is often wanted by college students prepping for the workforce. We teach them how to set up and structure their code the way companies do. And with every project, they gain the coding experience for CV.

  • Benefit 3
    Robotics

    Artificial Intelligence is the powerhouse of robotics. A machine without code is just a piece of junk! Let the programming experts teach your kids the coding needed to put life into hardware. And soon enough, your kid too will be able to join Madam Ella in the prestigious Nao Program.

    ANNOUNCING: We're excited to announce our new partnership, bringing fun and educational toys directly to your home for our little ones. Kids can now engage in hands-on building, customize mechanics, and delight in the movements of their toys.Play at home or come to us and we'll help you grow!

    Download Video.

    R100toy
Paint like AI DaVinci!
Our mantra

We don't fear AI, we build AI!

In the era of AI, it isn't just enough to jot down a few lines of code. It is vital to be able to code so well that AI cannot replace you. At Into Binary, we mentor students into becoming the architects of AI themselves!

See, long before AI became mainstream, our students had coded "DaVinci." With the click of a button, the computer was programmed to generate art in various styles, with unparalled precision and creativity -- from the realistic simulations of Sim cities to the Mondrian compositions, transforming ordinary shapes into captivating works of art.

Madam Ella thought them how to create this AI painter, from scratch! These mentees are ready to face the future of tech!

Meet the Mentor
Madam Ella says: The 4th Industrial Revolution is Africa's moment to leapfrog.

Madam Ella is keen to meet with you and discuss your needs. Contact her on whatsapp, by email, or book an appointment with this chat bot. You can also join our #MovieMornings to explore science-fiction and the future of tech.

Instagram

What's so great about Into Binary?

Breakthrough discovery cannot change the world if they do not leave the lab. We teach coding through actionable real-life projects to inspire the mentees as they see the direct impact of their work.

Why you should download our brochure?

  • Get to know how we work. We prioritize the pace of the student's syllabus. Our focal point is technological ingenuity and academic excellence.

  • Meet the Mentor. Meet Madam Ella, the founder of Into Binary. And check out some selected work. We have built games, apps, websites and more.

  • Understand what we do best. We give personalized programs for any age group. Our service offer is based on measurable and result-focused lab projects.

From the words of our students, "it's the best weekend program in Johannesburg!"
